item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Ariana Grande - Yours Truly (Tenth Anniversary Edition) (2023) [HIGHRESAUDIO HRA 24bits/48.0kHz]

07 Daydreamin'

11 Popular

13 The Way (Spanglish Version)
14 Honeymoon Avenue (Live from London)
15 Daydreamin' (Live from London)
16 Baby I (Live from London)
17 Tattooed Heart (Live from London)
18 Right There (Live from London)
19 The Way (Live from London)



Info for Yours Truly (Tenth Anniversary Edition)


Ariana Grande has released a new deluxe edition of her 2013 debut album, Yours Truly, to celebrate its 10th anniversary. The expanded album includes “Live from London” versions of multiple tracks and a new Spanglish version of “The Way” featuring the late Mac Miller.

Ariana Grande has said that she started on Yours Truly in August 2010, just a few months after the premiere of her Nickelodeon show, Victorious. She signed to Republic Records (at the time known as Universal Republic Records) a year after beginning work on the album. The first Yours Truly single, the Mac Miller collaboration “The Way,” arrived in March 2013. The single was Grande’s first to feature on the Billboard Hot 100, debuting in April at No. 10 on the chart. Two more singles—“Baby I” and “Right There”—before the release of Yours Truly on Friday, August 30, 2013. Shortly after its release, Yours Truly debuted atop the Billboard 200.

Grande’s latest studio album, Positions, landed in 2020. She’s more recently released a pair of remixes with the Weeknd (“Save Your Tears” and “Die for You”), collaborated with Demi Lovato (“Met Him Last Night”), and joined with Kid Cudi for “Just Look Up,” and made a Christmas song with Mariah Carey.

Ariana Grande
